SeqBank%.tooltip: Banking ratio for all sequential cells: (MBitFlops + MBitLatch) / SeqCells

FlopBank%.tooltip: Banking ratio for flops only: MBitFlops / (1BitFlops + MBitFlops)

Bits/Flop.tooltip: Average number of bits per flop from banking

Bits/Seq.tooltip: Average number of bits per sequential cell from banking

SeqCells.tooltip: Total number of sequential cells (flops and latches)

1BitEqSeq.tooltip: Number of single-bit equivelent sequential cells (if single-bit flops/latches are treated as one cell, 2-bit are treated as two cells, 4-bit are treated as four cells, ...)

IsoBank%.tooltip: Isolation cell banking ratio: MBitIso / (1BitIso + MBitIso)

1BitEqIso.tooltip: Number of single-bit equivalent isolation cells (if single-bit isolation cells are treated as one cell, 2-bit are treated as two cells, 4-bit are treated as four cells, ...)

LSBank%.tooltip: Level-shifter cell banking ratio: MBitLS / (1BitLS + MBitLS)

1BitEqLS.tooltip: Number of single-bit equivalent level-shifter cells (if single-bit level-shifter cells are treated as one cell, 2-bit are treated as two cells, 4-bit are treated as four cells, ...)

ELSBank%.tooltip: Enable level-shifter cell banking ratio: MBitELS / (1BitELS + MBitELS)

ELSCells.tooltip: Total number of enable level-shifter cells

1BitELS.tooltip: Number of single-bit enable level-shifter cells

1BitEqELS.tooltip: Number of single-bit equivalent enable level-shifter cells (if single-bit enable level-shifter cells are treated as one cell, 2-bit are treated as two cells, 4-bit are treated as four cells, ...)
